extension.description: Gravis gamepad er en controller produceret af Advanced Gravis Computer Technology i 1991. Det var den første gamepad til IBM PC på et marked domineret af joysticks.
The Gravis gamepad is a controller produced by Advanced Gravis Computer Technology in 1991. It was the first gamepad for the IBM PC in a market dominated by joysticks.
Gravis 游戏手柄是由 Advanced Gravis Computer Technology 于1991年生产的控制器。这是 IBM PC 在游戏杆主导的市场上的第一款游戏手柄。
